full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUB 'DI NYID PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS KYI MI GSAL BA RNAMS DER GANG GSUNG LTAR NGAG DON 'BA' ZHIG GO BDE BAR BSGRIG PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUB 'DI NYID PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS KYI MI GSAL BA RNAMS DER GANG GSUNG LTAR NGAG DON 'BA' ZHIG GO BDE BAR BSGRIG PA 'DI NI 'GROGS MCHOG DAM PA AENG KHE DAR KHAN GNYER BA'I KHA 'DON DU, GNAS LNGA RIG PA'I, ,DZA YA PAndI TA CHEN PO'I BKA' BANG THA SHAL BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYIS RJE NYID KYI GSUNG JI LTA BA BZHIN BSGRIGS SHING SBYOR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RING LUGS PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SHU BHAm MASTU SARBA DZA GA TAm, ,)
